story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Backbone UI
caption: perka.github.com
description: Backbone UI provides a simple way to represent your Backbone Models and Collections as UI components.  The need to shuffle data in and out of your UI is replaced with simple data binding techniques.  All components are skinnable with CSS, and will render consistently accross browsers.
